name: Hentai Muse
description:
Gameplay:

Move All Parts to Form the Complete Image.

Characteristics


  • 8 Levels
  • 8 Uncensored artworks
  • Relaxing soundtrack
  • 8 Steam Achievements
  • Full hd art gallery

    Cheat Mode:


    Press "C" to complete the level.

    Gallery:


    Mouse scroll up/down = zoom in/out

Note: All Characters 18+ Years Old.


Every artwork in our game were paid.
